# The `ScopedNoAliasAAResult` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A simple <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> result which uses scoped-noalias metadata to answer queries. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A simple <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> result which uses scoped-noalias metadata to answer queries.

### invalidate() {#a60547b8615994ab118e03512438d5211}

<MemberDefinition

Handle invalidation events from the new pass manager.

By definition, this result is stateless and so remains valid.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scopednoaliasaa-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scopednoaliasaa-h">ScopedNoAliasAA.h</a>.
